speakerBioSummary.text:
• Evan Peters is an American actor, best known for his multiple roles on the FX anthology series American Horror Story, as "Stan Bowes" in the first season of the FX drama Pose, and his role as the mutant "Quicksilver" in the superhero films X-Men: Days of Future Past, X-Men: Apocalypse, and Dark Phoenix. 
  • He played Detective Colin Zabel in HBO's Mare of Easttown which earned him his first Emmy Award in the Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited or Anthology Series or Movie category.
  • He made his acting debut in the 2004 drama film Clipping Adam and starred in the ABC science fiction series Invasion.
  • He also had recurring roles on Disney Channel's Phil of the Future and The CW's One Tree Hill and had a supporting role in the superhero film Kick-Ass.
  • From 2004 to 2010, Peters appeared in numerous national commercials for established brands such as Kelloggs, Papa John's Pizza, and PlayStation.

speakerBiography.text:
Evan Peters is an American actor, best known for his multiple roles on the FX anthology series American Horror Story, Stan Bowes in the first season of the FX drama Pose, and his role as the mutant Quicksilver in the superhero films X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014), X-Men: Apocalypse (2016), and Dark Phoenix (2019).

He made his acting debut in the 2004 drama film Clipping Adam and starred in the ABC science fiction series Invasion from 2005 to 2006.

He played Detective Colin Zabel in HBO's Mare of Easttown which earned him his first Emmy Award in the Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited or Anthology Series or Movie category.

From 2004 to 2010, Peters appeared in numerous national commercials for established brands such as Kelloggs, Papa John's Pizza and PlayStation. During this time he also had recurring roles on Disney Channel's Phil of the Future and The CW's One Tree Hill. In 2010, he had a supporting role in the superhero film Kick-Ass.

relatedSpeakers.name: Noah Centineo
